name: Giga: Impact
description:
*THIS GAME IS A NEW THING FOR ME, SO BUGS MAY OCCUR! TELL ME IN COMMENTS SO I CAN FIX THEM ASAP! THANKS FOR THE HELP!*

(May take a while to load)

Giga: Impact is a game I made because I was bored.  But that's all my games.  In this game you take control of a machine gun and need to shoot down the enemies down below.  To know the controls, then press on the "Tutorial" button.  Ok I'll let you play now :)

Gamemodes:Tutorial: Tells you most of the basics, 100% recommended if you haven't played this game before.Play: The original experience, recommended.Debug: Shows you all the variables, blocks up most of the screen.  Wouldn't recommend unless you want to see some of the behind the scenes.Onslaught: Infinite waves of enemies, allies spawn less, and bosses are more frequent.
Enemy Variants:Blue: Normal enemy, nothing weird about it.Green:  Green is your ally, don't shoot themMech: First boss, just shoot them and you'll be fine.Pink: Huge behemoth that is capable of taking tons of hits, use your abilities to help defeat it.Dark green: Defines what ending you get, shoot them or let them pass for seperate endings.Pastel green: Spawned when you kill too much allies.
